# f5distributedcloud_namespace (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_namespace` data source retrieves information about an existing namespace.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_namespace" "example" {
  name = "my-namespace"
}

output "namespace_id" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_namespace.example.id
}
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Copyright (c) Robin Mordasiewicz
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Example: Look up an existing namespace
data "f5distributedcloud_namespace" "existing" {
  name = "my-namespace"
}

output "namespace_id" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_namespace.existing.id
}

output "namespace_description" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_namespace.existing.description
}

# Example: Use namespace data in a resource
resource "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "example" {
  name              = "example-pool"
  namespace         = data.f5distributedcloud_namespace.existing.name
  description       = "Pool in ${data.f5distributedcloud_namespace.existing.name}"
  port              = 8080
  endpoint_protocol = "http"

  origin_servers {
    public_name {
      dns_name = "backend.example.com"
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the namespace to look up.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the namespace.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the namespace.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the namespace.
